name: zap-cannon
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Powerful and sure to cause
paralysis, but inaccurate.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Powerful and sure to cause
paralysis, but inaccurate.

An electric blast is
fired like a cannon
to inflict damage
and paralyze.
